name: Erna Schneider Hoover
summary: Invented a computerized telephone switching method that replaced switchboards and "revolutionized modern communication".

name: Radia Perlman
summary: Came up with a way to route information packets in an "infinitely scalable" way that allowed large networks like the Internet to function.

name: Hu Qiheng
summary: Leader of the team who installed the first TCP/IP connection for China
